channel.title: Need help bad
channel.description: hi im a huge noob when it comes to making and coding private servers but i really want to learn ive tried following a couple of tutorials on here but keep getting stuck. Can someone please help me on skype or something or teach me the basics?

item.title: Need help bad
item.dc:creator: @goofstatus goofstatus
item.description:
@goofstatus wrote:

yeah im pretty lost now i dont know which java im supose to download every guide is a different one can someone please tell me which one im suppose to download? im talking about the JDK btw

item.title: Need help bad
item.dc:creator: @goofstatus goofstatus
item.description:
@goofstatus wrote:

well im not just gunna go and start hosting a server tonight im going to put weeks of work into it but thanks for the help so far ill give that a read

Read full topic

item.title: Need help bad
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

k. learn to code first. then try hosting a server…
Book on Java, give it a read.
http://math.hws.edu/javanotes/

It’s not something you learn over night and if you don’t put the effort in, why should we even try to teach you?

It is a fairly decent book and i know a bit about java, i am on chapter 4.7 and still reading it, even though some of the stuff i already know. don’t skip the things you think are “boring”.
You may have to read some things more than once. but just get them in your head first. once you can write your own program, you might be able to work on a server. might…

Read full topic
